hadiths.text: It was narrated Az-Zuhri, from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet said:"When Ramadan begins, the gates of mercy are opened and the gates of Hall are closed, and the devils are chained up

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى مَعْمَرٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning Different Reports From Mamar Concerning That
